title: Ocean Tigers Dive House
subtitle: Book Directly With Us for the best rates.
content:
At Ocean Tigers Dive House, we pride ourselves on providing that "home sweet home" feeling people love so much. It's almost like home away from home.



Our dive house hostel, located in Cabo San Lucas Baja Mexico, offers a beautiful stay at an affordiable price; With a focus on freediving, diving and more!

full.description: Bring all your friends and enjoy the entire house all to yourselves.

private.description: Our private room sleeps 4 people, 1 bunk bed and 2 singles beds.

shared.description: Our shared rooms sleeps 6 people, 3 bunk beds. USD 15.00.
